PHRASE.LANG: kName
Armour Pack: Commando, Marine and Black Tank
Ensemble Armure : Commando, Marine et Black Tank
Rüstungsbündel: Commando, Marine und Black Tank
Pacchetto di armature: Commando, Marine e Black Tank
Pack de armadura: Commando, Marine y Black Tank
아머 팩: 코만도, 해병, 검은 탱크 (여성)
Armor Pack: Commando, Marine and Black Tank (Women)
裝甲服裝組：突擊部隊、海軍陸戰隊及漆黑坦克(女用)
裝甲服裝組：突擊部隊、海軍陸戰隊及漆黑坦克(女用)
Armor Pack: Commando, Marine and Black Tank
kDesc

Contains the following three full Armour sets for you to mix and match, Commando Light Armour Set, Marine Medium Armour Set and Black Tank Heavy Armour Set, contains the following fifteen parts: 
 
 1. Commando - Light Field Body Armour 
 2. Commando - Light Field Boots 
 3. Commando - Light Field Glove 
 4. Commando - Light Field Helmet 
 5. Commando - Light Field Leg Armour 
 6. Marine - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 7. Marine - Medium Assault Boots 
 8. Marine - Medium Assault Gloves 
 9. Marine - Medium Assault Helmet 
 10. Marine - Medium Assault Leg Armour 
 11. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Body Armour 
 12. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Boots 
 13. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Gloves 
 14. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Helmet 
 15. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Leg Armour [#Legal]

Vous n'aurez que l'embarras du choix avec ces trois ensembles Armure complets (Ensemble Armure Légère Commando, Ensemble Armure Moyenne Marine & Ensemble Armure Lourde Black Tank), contenant les quinze éléments suivants : 
 
 1. Commando - Gilet de terrain léger 
 2. Commando - Bottes de terrain légères 
 3. Commando - Gant de terrain légers 
 4. Commando - Casque de terrain léger 
 5. Commando - Jambières de terrain légères 
 6. Marine - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 7. Marine - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 8. Marine - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 9. Marine - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 10. Marine - Jambières d'assaut moyennes 
 11. Black Tank - Gilet de combat lourd 
 12. Black Tank - Bottes de combat lourdes 
 13. Black Tank - Gants de combat lourds 
 14. Black Tank - Casque de combat lourd 
 15. Black Tank - Jambières de combat lourdes [#Legal]

Enthält die folgenden drei kompletten Rüstungssets für Dich zum Kombinieren: Leichtes Rüstungsset Commando, Mittelschweres Rüstungsset Marine & Schweres Rüstungsset Black Tank; umfasst die folgenden fünfzehn Teile: 
 
 1. Commando - Leichte Panzerweste 
 2. Commando - Leichte Stiefel 
 3. Commando - Leichte Handschuhe 
 4. Commando - Leichter Helm 
 5. Commando - Leichte Beinrüstung 
 6. Marine - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 7. Marine - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 8. Marine - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 9. Marine - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 10. Marine - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 11. Black Tank - Panzerweste für schwere Kämpfe 
 12. Black Tank - Stiefel für schwere Kämpfe 
 13. Black Tank - Handschuhe für schwere Kämpfe 
 14. Black Tank - Helm für schwere Kämpfe 
 15. Black Tank - Beinrüstung für schwere Kämpfe [#Legal]

Contiene i tre set di armature seguenti che possono essere mischiati tra loro: set di armatura leggera Commando, set di armatura media Marine e set di armatura pesante Black Tank. Contiene i 15 componenti seguenti: 
 
 1. Commando - armatura per il corpo da combattimento leggero 
 2. Commando - stivali da combattimento leggero 
 3. Commando - guanti da combattimento leggero 
 4. Commando - casco da combattimento leggero 
 5. Commando - armatura per le gambe da combattimento leggero 
 6. Marine - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 7. Marine - stivali d'assalto medio 
 8. Marine - guanti d'assalto medio 
 9. Marine - casco d'assalto medio 
 10. Marine - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio 
 11. Black Tank - armatura per il corpo da combattimento pesante 
 12. Black Tank - stivali da combattimento pesante 
 13. Black Tank - guanti da combattimento pesante 
 14. Black Tank - casco da combattimento pesante 
 15. Black Tank - armatura per le gambe da combattimento pesante [#Legal]

Contiene los tres siguientes sets de armadura, que podrás combinar entre ellos: Commando ligera, Marine media y Black Tank pesada. Se compone de las 15 partes siguientes: 
 
 1. Commando - Armadura corporal de campo ligera 
 2. Commando - Botas de campo ligeras 
 3. Commando - Guantes de campo ligeros 
 4. Commando - Casco de campo ligero 
 5. Commando - Armadura de campo ligera para pierna 
 6. Marine - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 7. Marine - Botas de asalto medias 
 8. Marine - Guantes de asalto medios 
 9. Marine - Casco de asalto medio 
 10. Marine - Armadura de asalto media para pierna 
 11. Black Tank - Armadura corporal de combate pesada 
 12. Black Tank - Botas de combate pesadas 
 13. Black Tank - Guantes de combate pesados 
 14. Black Tank - Casco de combate pesado 
 15. Black Tank - Armadura de combate pesada para pierna [#Legal]

다음과 같은 세 개의 방어구 세트의 15개 아이템을 포함합니다. 자유로운 연출이 가능합니다 - 코만도 경량 방어구 세트, 해병 중형 방어구 세트, 검은 탱크 강화 방어구 세트:
 
 1. 코만도 - 경량 야전 상체방어구 (여성)
 2. 코만도 - 경량 야전부츠 (여성)
 3. 코만도 - 경량 야전장갑 (여성)
 4. 코만도 - 경량 야전헬멧 (여성)
 5. 코만도 - 경량 야전 하체방어구 (여성)
 6. 해병 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (여성)
 7. 해병 - 중형 돌격부츠 (여성)
 8. 해병 - 중형 돌격장갑 (여성)
 9. 해병 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (여성)
 10. 해병 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (여성)
 11. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투 상체방어구 (여성)
 12. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투부츠 (여성)
 13. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투장갑 (여성)
 14. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투헬멧 (여성)
 15. 검은 탱크 - 강화 전투 하체방어구 (여성) [#Legal]

Contains the following three full armor sets for you to mix and match, Commando Light Armor Set, Marine Medium Armor Set and Black Tank Heavy Armor Set, contains the following fifteen parts:
 
 1. Commando - Light Field Body Armor (Women)
 2. Commando - Light Field Boots (Women)
 3. Commando - Light Field Glove (Women)
 4. Commando - Light Field Helmet (Women)
 5. Commando - Light Field Leg Armor (Women)
 6. Marine - Medium Assault Body Armor (Women)
 7. Marine - Medium Assault Boots (Women)
 8. Marine - Medium Assault Gloves (Women)
 9. Marine - Medium Assault Helmet (Women)
 10. Marine - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Women)
 11. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Body Armor (Women)
 12. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Boots (Women)
 13. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Gloves (Women)
 14. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Helmet (Women)
 15. Black Tank - Heavy Combat Leg Armor (Women) [#Legal]

包括突擊部隊輕型裝甲服裝組、海軍陸戰隊中型裝甲服裝組及漆黑坦克重型裝甲服裝組3套裝甲服裝組，可用作自由配搭。當中包括下列15個部分：
 
 1. 突擊部隊 - 輕型野外護甲(女用)
 2. 突擊部隊 - 輕型野外靴子(女用)
 3. 突擊部隊 - 輕型野外手套(女用)
 4. 突擊部隊 - 輕型野外頭盔(女用)
 5. 突擊部隊 - 輕型野外護脛(女用)
 6. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊護甲(女用)
 7. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊靴子(女用)
 8. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊手套(女用)
 9. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊頭盔(女用)
 10. 海軍陸戰隊 - 中型突擊護脛(女用)
 11. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥護甲(女用)
 12. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥靴子(女用)
 13. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥手套(女用)
 14. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥頭盔(女用)
 15. 漆黑坦克 - 重型戰鬥護脛(女用) [#Legal]
